title: Supreme Court Upholds Validity of Section 6A of the Citizenship Act
summary: A Constitution Bench of the Supreme Court upheld the constitutional validity of Section 6A of the Citizenship Act, 1955, which grants citizenship to immigrants who entered Assam before March 25, 1971. The court ruled that the provision serves a humanitarian purpose and does not violate Article 14.

title: Delhi High Court Issues Guidelines on Enforcement of Foreign Arbitral Awards
summary: The Delhi High Court issued comprehensive guidelines for enforcement of foreign arbitral awards under the New York Convention, streamlining the process and reducing delays. The court clarified the scope of public policy objections under Section 48 of the Arbitration Act.

title: SEBI Introduces New Framework for ESG Rating Providers
summary: SEBI has notified a comprehensive regulatory framework for Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) rating providers. The framework mandates registration, transparency in methodology, management of conflicts of interest, and periodic disclosures by ESG rating agencies.

title: RBI Circular on Digital Lending: Key Compliance Requirements
summary: The Reserve Bank of India issued updated guidelines on digital lending, mandating that all loan disbursements and repayments occur directly between the borrower and the regulated entity's bank account. Third-party platforms are prohibited from handling loan funds.

title: Parliament Passes Digital Personal Data Protection (Amendment) Bill, 2026
summary: Parliament passed the Digital Personal Data Protection (Amendment) Bill, introducing stricter penalties for data breaches and expanding the Data Protection Board's powers. The amendment mandates that data fiduciaries appoint a Data Protection Officer within 90 days.

title: MCA Notifies Rules for Fast-Track Cross-Border Mergers
summary: The Ministry of Corporate Affairs has notified new rules enabling fast-track cross-border mergers for companies with turnover below Rs 500 crore. The rules aim to simplify the process under the Companies Act, 2013 and reduce NCLT approval timelines.

title: Supreme Court Clarifies Scope of Arbitration Clause in Unstamped Agreements
summary: The Supreme Court in a landmark 7-judge bench decision clarified that an arbitration clause in an unstamped agreement is not void but unenforceable until proper stamp duty is paid. The court overruled the earlier N.N. Global decision.

title: CBDT Issues Clarification on Angel Tax Provisions for Startups
summary: The Central Board of Direct Taxes issued a clarification stating that DPIIT-recognized startups with aggregate paid-up share capital not exceeding Rs 25 crore will be exempt from angel tax provisions under Section 56(2)(viib) of the Income Tax Act.

title: Bombay High Court Strikes Down Retrospective GST Notification
summary: The Bombay High Court struck down a retrospective GST notification that sought to levy tax on services provided by clubs and associations to their members. The court held that retrospective taxation violates Article 19(1)(g) of the Constitution.

title: SEBI Tightens Insider Trading Norms for Connected Persons
summary: SEBI has amended the Prohibition of Insider Trading Regulations to expand the definition of 'connected persons' and mandate structured digital databases for tracking access to unpublished price-sensitive information (UPSI).

title: New Labour Codes: Government Sets April 2026 Implementation Date
summary: The Ministry of Labour confirmed that the four new Labour Codes on Wages, Industrial Relations, Social Security, and Occupational Safety will be implemented from April 1, 2026, requiring all establishments to update employment contracts and HR policies.

title: RBI Increases UPI Transaction Limit for Tax Payments to Rs 5 Lakh
summary: The Reserve Bank of India has enhanced the per-transaction limit for UPI payments towards tax payments from Rs 1 lakh to Rs 5 lakh. The move aims to facilitate easier digital tax compliance for individuals and businesses.

title: Supreme Court Orders Mandatory Mediation Before Filing of Commercial Disputes
summary: In a significant ruling, the Supreme Court directed that all commercial disputes above Rs 1 crore must undergo mandatory pre-litigation mediation under the Commercial Courts Act before being filed in court, to reduce pendency.

title: MCA Simplifies LLP Annual Filing Process with New Form 11A
summary: The Ministry of Corporate Affairs has introduced a simplified annual filing form (Form 11A) for LLPs with turnover below Rs 5 crore. The new form consolidates multiple compliance requirements into a single filing.

title: GST Council Recommends 18% Rate on Online Gaming; 28% on Casinos
summary: The 56th GST Council meeting recommended maintaining 18% GST on online skill-based gaming and 28% on casinos and betting. The Council also approved the inclusion of Extra Neutral Alcohol under GST with a 5% rate.

title: Karnataka High Court Declares IT Sector Layoffs Without Notice as Unfair Labour Practice
summary: The Karnataka High Court ruled that mass layoffs in the IT sector without adequate notice or compensation constitute unfair labour practice under the Industrial Disputes Act. The ruling impacts several large IT companies in Bengaluru.

title: DPDPA Rules Notified: Data Localization Requirements for Critical Personal Data
summary: The government has notified rules under the Digital Personal Data Protection Act requiring that critical personal data (financial, health, biometric) be stored and processed within India. Companies have 180 days to comply.

title: SEBI Mandates T+0 Settlement for Top 500 Stocks from March 2026
summary: SEBI has issued a circular mandating same-day (T+0) settlement for the top 500 stocks by market capitalization from March 31, 2026. The move follows the successful implementation of T+1 settlement and aims to enhance market efficiency.

title: Government Introduces Bharatiya Sakshya (Amendment) Bill for Digital Evidence
summary: The government introduced the Bharatiya Sakshya (Amendment) Bill to strengthen provisions for admissibility of digital evidence, including blockchain records, IoT device data, and AI-generated documents in court proceedings.

title: Supreme Court Directs States to Establish Commercial Courts in Every District
summary: The Supreme Court directed all state governments to establish dedicated Commercial Courts in every district within 6 months, citing the need to expedite resolution of commercial disputes and improve India's ease of doing business ranking.

title: RBI Issues Master Direction on IT Governance for Regulated Entities
summary: The RBI issued comprehensive Master Directions on IT Governance and Cybersecurity for all regulated entities, mandating CISO appointment, annual IT audits, and incident reporting within 6 hours of a cyber incident.

title: Income Tax Department Launches New Faceless Assessment Portal 2.0
summary: The Income Tax Department launched the upgraded Faceless Assessment Portal 2.0 with AI-driven case selection, video conferencing for hearings, and real-time status tracking. The portal aims to reduce assessment completion time to 90 days.

title: Madras High Court Upholds Validity of Pre-Packaged Insolvency for MSMEs
summary: The Madras High Court upheld the constitutional validity of the pre-packaged insolvency resolution process for MSMEs under the IBC, rejecting challenges that it discriminated against operational creditors.

title: MCA Proposes Mandatory CSR Spending Audit for Companies Above Rs 100 Crore Turnover
summary: The Ministry of Corporate Affairs has issued a draft notification proposing mandatory third-party audit of CSR spending for companies with turnover exceeding Rs 100 crore, aiming to ensure genuine compliance with Section 135 of the Companies Act.

title: Data Protection Board Issues First Penalty Under DPDPA for Healthcare Data Breach
summary: The Data Protection Board of India imposed its first penalty of Rs 50 crore on a leading healthcare platform for a data breach affecting 5 million users. The Board found violations of data minimization and security safeguard obligations.
